title: Microsoft Viva: Briefing Email Favorite and Snooze Preferences
description: [We've paused sending briefing emails starting early 2023 and this service will continue to stay paused until further notice.] Personalize your daily briefing emails via 'favorite' and 'snooze.' Favorited contents will be prioritized, and Snoozed contents will be deprioritized in your future briefing emails.
